options.name: Controls
options.description: Adjust the delay for the game audio.

options.name: Note Offset
options.description: Adjust the delay for the game audio.

options.name: Low Quality
options.description: If checked, disables some background details, decreases loading times and improves performance.

options.name: Anti-Aliasing
options.description: If unchecked, disables anti-aliasing, increases performance at the cost of sharper visuals.

options.name: Shaders
options.description: If unchecked, disables shaders. It's used for some visual effects, and also CPU intensive for weaker PCs.

options.name: GPU Caching
options.description: If checked, allows the GPU to be used for caching textures, decreasing RAM usage. Don't turn this on if you have a shitty Graphics Card.

options.name: Note Splash Opacity
options.description: How much transparent should the Note Splashes be.

options.name: Flashing Lights
options.description: Uncheck this if you're sensitive to flashing lights!

options.name: Check for Updates
options.description: Turn this on to check for updates when you start the game.

options.name: Discord Rich Presence
options.description: Uncheck this to prevent accidental leaks, it will hide the Application from your "Playing" box on Discord.

options.name: Downscroll
options.description: If checked, notes go Down instead of Up, simple enough.

options.name: Ghost Tapping
options.description: If checked, you won't get misses from pressing keys while there are no notes able to hit.

options.name: Disable Reset Button
options.description: If checked, pressing Reset won't do anything.

options.name: Botplay
options.description: If checked, the game will basically play itself (This will not prevent the player from dying and will not save the score).

options.name: Practice Mode
options.description: If checked, the game will disable the possibility of dying (This will not save your score).
